subject: Re: Thank you for your refinance loan request, we accepted your debt request
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TONIGHT):
$344,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://lovuikeisowcost.com/
